content: Right? Like…why does it have to get fucked up!? Just…walk away! And YES. Yes yes yes, I’m so glad I stumbled upon your stuff. I never thought I’d find, as I’ve said before, bona fide friends. I NEVER thought I’d consider like, meeting someone. In person. Where, like, judging and awkward happens. ::shudder:: But I suppose I get protective because I have imposter syndrome like whoa, and if someone ever doubted my authenticity…I think I’d never write again. Like with music, you know? Someone called me out, and that was it. I hope my skin is thicker now, but that kind of response can be devastating.
